AUTHOR: Tyler
INSTALL_MSG: A install message that appears as soon as the end user does !cog install repo cogname
NAME: coinbet
SHORT: Users can bet if a coin is going to be heads or tails.
DESCRIPTION: Users can bet on a coin if it is going to be heads or tails with !bet [amount] [guess], winning doubles your wagered money and losing makes you lose it. It is on a 60 second cooldown.
